patthana22.35:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa …pe… adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.35:3.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:4.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:5.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:6.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:7.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:8.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:9.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasavitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:10.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naavitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:11.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho savicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:12.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho avicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:13.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho sappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:14.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho appītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:15.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:16.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanapītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:17.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:18.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:19.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:20.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanaupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:21.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:21.1_2: adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.35:22.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanakāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:23.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ narūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:24.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:24.1_2: adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.35:25.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho arūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:26.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanaarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:27.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ napariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:28.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naapariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho apariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:29.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:30.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:31.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho niyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:32.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:33.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasauttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:34.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho anuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
